creator: nathanr@nathanr.net
text:
Although it's not mentioned in the documentation, the classpathref= attribute
appears to work with <typedef> / <taskdef>. Suggest you add an example down the
bottom of the <typedef> doco using this, and potentially a one liner at the top
of the page saying it exists.

creator: peterreilly@apache.org
text:
Well spotted,
doc has been updated will be in next release of ant.

creator: hauser@acm.org
text: couldn't the documentation be updated between releases?
